title: Pastry Shop
description: Mock of an cake shop e-commerce page.
extra_description:
Technologies used:
• React-Redux
• React-Reuter
• Express

• Cypress

title: Chat App
description:
Simple app for signup login and posting comments on a thread.
It implement CRUD methods for the user account and the comments posted
extra_description:
Technologies used:
• ReactJS:
	◦ useContext
	◦ react-router
	◦ axios
• nodejs
• express
• mongoose
• Json web tokens
• Cypress for CI testing

title: Trivia Quiz App
description:
This is a solo project from the Scrimba course on React.

The app fetch 5 questions from https://opentdb.com/ API.

It keep track of the correct and incorrect answers of each question in a state and calculate your final score.

title: Picture Shop
description: This project is a React practice project that simulates a shop that sell pictures.
extra_description:
Libraries used:
• React-routes
• useContext
• Custom hooks

title: Supplies Database Manager
description: App than can use CRUD methods to manipulate a mongo data base

title: Color Picker
description: It's a solo project from a scrimba course. You pick an color from the color picker a theme from a dropdown menu, send a request to the site https://www.thecolorapi.com/ for an object with 5 colors and then display the colors with their hex codes.

title: Tenizes Game
description: Roll the dices until every dice is the same. Click on any dice to freeze it.
